data.title: Celeb couple and ‘That 70’s show’ actors Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis are setting major marriage goals
data.meta_description: Hollywood couple Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis, who have worked together on That 70's show, have been together for 8 years now and they sure have given us several marriage goals.  They inspire us to be good to our partners and do justice to our marriages and relationships.
data.text:
The beloved Hollywood couple

‘That 70’s Show’ actor Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis, a beloved Hollywood couple, give us several inspiring relationship and marriage goals and here is what we can learn from loving duo.

Friendship turned love

They began as friends while co-starring on "That '70s Show" and developed a deep bond before transitioning into a romantic relationship, highlighting the value of a strong foundation in friendship.

Privacy

Ashton and Mila have maintained a relatively private personal life, keeping their relationship away from the constant scrutiny of the media, emphasising on the importance of protecting one's relationship from external pressures.

Shared values

Both share a commitment to their family and cultural roots, often incorporating their heritage into their family life. Showing us the significance of aligning values and traditions.

Supportive partners

They publicly support each other's careers and endeavours, emphasising the importance of being each other's biggest cheerleaders.

Parenting as a team

As parents, they work together to provide a stable and loving environment for their children, becoming a great example of teamwork in raising a family.

Humour

Their relationship is marked by a sense of humor and playfulness, which show us how important laughter and fun are as components of a strong bond.

Prioritising family time

Despite their busy schedules, Ashton and Mila prioritise spending quality time together as a family, highlighting the importance of balancing work and personal life.
